GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.10.122
GSD.description:
lkdtm/bugs: Check for the NULL pointer after calling kmalloc

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.122 by commit 56ac04f35fc5dc8b5b67a1fa2f7204282aa887d5, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit ae2e1aad3e48e495878d9f149e437a308bfdaefa. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: lkdtm/bugs: Check for the NULL pointer after calling kmalloc
